specs.title: Required user level to post
specs.description:
Allow users from the selected level and up to post.
Default level: 10

specs.title: Main category selector exceptions
specs.description:
You can limit the categories displayed in the main category selector by user level. This allow you to prevent low level users to publish on public categories only where only higher level users can post.
Use one line per every category with the next syntax:
category_slug - min_user_level
Note: this function is merely cosmetic: it only limits the categories displayed on the list selector and hides the quick post form accordingly (if enabled). It doesn't restrict the posts to have "hidden" categories applied or being excluded from indexes.

specs.title: Permalink style
specs.description: Select how post permalinks should be displayed everywhere.

specs.title: Disable posts index on home page
specs.description:
If enabled, no posts index will be shown in the home page.
The index will be available through the archives (/date/yyyy/mmm/dd), categories (/category/slug) and any of /blog, /posts, /articles or any .htaccess rule you set.

specs.title: Post categories for the home slider
specs.description:
Specify the category slugs and the amount of hours that you want to show up on the home slider, one per line, using the next syntax: category_slug - time_to_live.
Set time_to_live to 0 to show them always (not recommended).
Hint: you may opt to enforce an expiration time for the posts here if you want to take them out of the site AND the slider when the time runs out.

specs.title: Categories to exclude from the main index
specs.description:
Specify a list of category slugs which posts should be excluded from the main (home) index, one per line.

You can set time based exclussions by using the next syntax:
slug - hours
With this form, only posts published within the last hours will be shown on the index, leaving the rest out.

specs.title: Posts to show per index page
specs.description:
Amount of posts to show per index (home, archives, etc.).
Defaults to 30.

specs.title: Excerpt length
specs.description:
Amount of characters to trim the post excerpts to.
Defaults to 30.

specs.title: Automatic featured images
specs.description:
If a post has no featured image but at least one has been inserted from the media gallery, the thumbnail of the first inserted image will be used as featured image for the post on all indexes.
Note: this setting may be affected by module extenders.

specs.title: Featured posts tag
specs.description: Set the tag (without the #) to use for the featured posts functionality in the home layout.

specs.title: Show featured posts tag everywhere?
specs.description: By default, the tag defined for featured posts will be hidden from public view. You should leave this as No to prevent everyone (but mods/admins) from using it. When set to Yes, the tag will be available in all views, and users may end up cluttering your featured posts area.

specs.title: Default featured posts thumbnail
specs.description:
Show this image on featured posts when they have no featured image selected.
Important: this setting may be overriden by other modules!

specs.title: Featured posts Time To Live (expiration time)
specs.description:
Set an expiration in hours for featured posts. They will remain there until the time goes out, then they'll just appear in normal indexes.
Set to 0 to disable keep them until the tag is manually taken out of them.

specs.title: Disable quick posts form?
specs.description: If disabled, users wont be able to post quick entries using the reduced composer on indexes.

specs.title: Time allowed for editing after publishing
specs.description:
Amount of minutes a user has to edit a post once published.
Set to 0 to disable post editing for everyone excep mods/admins.
Set to -1 to allow editing always.

specs.title: User level allowed to edit posts with comments
specs.description: By default, everyone can edit posts with comments. If you want to restrict this feature, set the user level to a higher value.

specs.title: User level allowed to edit custom fields
specs.description: By default, only mods/admins can set custom fields on posts. If you want to allow others to do it, set the wanted level here.

specs.title: In-form Per-category messages
specs.description:
If you want to show a message below the categories selector for each category (like content rules, etc.), specify one per line using the next syntax:
category_slug | Message to show in plain text
You can temporarily disable messages by adding a # at the begining of the line.
If you need to add more than one text line per message, simply repeat the slug, E.G.:
category_1 | Text line 1
category_1 | Text line 2
category_2 | Text line 1
category_2 | Text line 2

specs.title: Enforced post expiration by category
specs.description:
Specify a list of category_slug - time_to_live, one per line, to specify for how many hours the posts that have one of the listed categories as main will be available. Once the time expires, posts will no longer appear on indexes and a "not found" error will be thrown when opened directly.
Note: this setting will override any expiration manually set by the post author.

specs.title: Lock posts with enforced expiration
specs.description: If enabled, posts with these categories wont be editable or deletable until they expire.

specs.title: Cache Main index cache TTL for guests
specs.description:
Amount of minutes to hold main index page caches for guests.
Set to 0 to disable caching (not recommended).
Recommended value: depends on the amount of posts being published, their timing and anonymous vs registered traffic.
5 minutes should be enough for constantly updated sites.
Set to 60 or more for less updated sites.

specs.title: Cache Version number for the guests main index cache
specs.description:
If you want to bump it, just add 1 to it.
Only used if the Main index cache for guests is set above 0.

specs.title: Cache Main index cache TTL for users
specs.description:
Amount of minutes to hold main index page caches for online users.
Set to 0 to disable caching (not recommended).
Recommended value: depends on the amount of posts being published, their timing and anonymous vs registered traffic.
5 minutes should be enough for constantly updated sites.
Set to 60 or more for less updated sites.

specs.title: Cache Version number for the users main index cache
specs.description:
If you want to bump it, just add 1 to it.
Only used if the Main index cache for guests is set above 0.

specs.title: Cache Slider posts cache TTL
specs.description:
Amount of minutes the posts for the home slider should be cached.
By default, it is disabled. If any value is set, the cache will be refreshed when a post for the slider is published.
Recommended value: 60 minutes or more.
Important: if you set enforced expiration time for the category that holds the slider posts, then you should set this cache to around 5 minutes.

specs.title: Cache Featured posts cache TTL
specs.description:
Amount of minutes the featured posts should be cached.
By default, it is disabled. If any value is set, the cache will be refreshed when a post with the featured posts tag is published.
Recommended value: 60 minutes or more.
Important: if you set a time to live for featured posts, then you should set this cache to around 5 minutes.

specs.title: Use Triklet module for reporting posts?
specs.description: If the Triklet module is installed and enabled and this option is set to "Yes", online users that hit the "report post" link will be redirected to Triklet's New Ticket composition form instead of going to the Contact form.

specs.title: Cache TTL
specs.description:
Time to live (in hours) for the listing cache.

specs.title: Cache version
specs.description: Version of the cache. If you want to refresh it, increment it by 1.
